node.address: Media Playa, Via La Barra - Ladrilleros, Buenavent , Buenaventura, Colombia

content.value:
Just walk to Ladrilleros or La Barra either by the beach or the dirt road. we are as far from the town to be completely quiet and as near to go shopping.

Our rooms are designed to fit each space and get the most out of the sea view. No room is the same as the other one. We use bunk-beds we build each room and bed to the need of the traveller and the most comfort possible. For us the kitchen is very important, so our kitchen is big and really well equipped. We got a Home cinema with AC and 5.1 Sound system. even a 3D TV. We got a small Jacuzzi, chill out area & more.

General:
- Reception Hours 8:00/22:00
- No curfew.
- We do not accept customers younger than 18 years of age.
- Pet friendly.

A Hostel design to enjoy the real freedom and beauty of nature, between the pacific sea and the jungle. share with us the best sea view, watch the greatness of the Whales and enjoy beautifull beaches just a few steps from the doorstep.

Offering a private beach area, Hostel Casa Azul offers accommodation in Ladrilleros. A vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the camping. Hostel Casa Azul offers a terrace. Guests can also relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area.
The nearest airport is Gerardo Tobar LÃ³pez, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description.description: Casa Azul pacifico designed every bed with a sea view, and we do not use traditional bunk beds, here is no better view of the sunsets than from our cliff. And you will enjoy fire place next to the cliff. When the Tide is high, feel the power of the sea hitting the cliffs. And for a special experience, you may enjoy swimming at night and discover the glowing plankton.
